thread.section_title: FC-Moto.de Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von FC-Moto.de | www.fc-moto.de | 7 von 264
thread.title: Ruth

author: Ruth
title: Ruth
text:
The answers to the questions in english were quite fast and we had a fluent conversation, althougth I have the impression that we didnt understand each other. Finally we did.
First I was inform on time of the delay of my order due to the lack of stock of one of the items, and I could delete this item to get the other ones shipped. Really appreciated. And the bill was corrected accordingly, I am really happy.
Thank you.
